# subentitiesByName

**Instance Property**

A dictionary containing the receiver’s sub-entities.

## Declaration

```swift
var subentitiesByName: [String : NSEntityDescription] { get }
```

## Return Value

The keys in the dictionary are the sub-entity names, the corresponding values are instances of `NSEntityDescription`.

## Managing inheritance

- **subentities**: An array containing the sub-entities of the receiver.
- **superentity**: The super-entity of the receiver.
- **isKindOf(entity:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is a sub-entity of another given entity.

items.description: An array containing the sub-entities of the receiver.
